casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Jimmy Orlando LITTLEJOHN No. 87P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 27, 2018 Mr. Michael E. Casterline, Asheville, Attorney at Law, for Littlejohn, Jimmy Orlando Mr. Scott K. Beaver, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina Mr. Jimmy Orlando Littlejohn, for Littlejohn, Jimmy Orlando Mr. Mike Miller, District Attorney, for State

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 23rd of March 2018 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of April 2018."
